metadata.title: CVE-2024-0806 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Passwords in Google Chrome prior to 121.0.6167.85 alloweda remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via specific UIinteraction. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
